Posts.EditableText:
I need some help.. Actually, an answer. My question is:
 How do multiplayer quest games work?
Posts.HTML:
I need some help.. Actually, an answer. My question is:
How do multiplayer quest games work?

Posts.EditableText: They work just fine! The Quest server (questnet) is a program which runs on your PC. You then have a client (Quest) which connects to the server (questnet) and you then play the text adventure game through that. A client can be on the same PC as the server.
Posts.HTML:
They work just fine!



The Quest server (questnet) is a program which runs on your PC.
You then have a client (Quest) which connects to the server (questnet) and you then play the text adventure game through that.

A client can be on the same PC as the server.

Posts.EditableText: And by the way, try to just create one topic named, say, "SarahParah needs Help" and post all your Q's there, instead of making heaps 'o' topics addressing singular problems EDIT: 200th post!
